category: news
title: "AI could worsen cyber-threats, report warns"
excerpt: "By 2025 artificial intelligence could increase the risk of cyber-attacks and erode trust in online content, a new government report has said. The tech could even help plan biological or chemical attacks by terrorists, it warns. But some experts have questioned whether the tech will evolve as predicted."
